definition: underneath/below/the underside/world of mortals/to descend to the world of mortals (of Gods)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The pain may also be felt beneath the precordium.
sentences.chinese: 也可在胸前区下方有疼痛感觉。

sentences.english: The Soyuz spacecraft appears at the bottom left.
sentences.chinese: 联盟号宇宙飞船出现在图片的左下方。

sentences.english: When a dam is built, the accumulating water presses down upon the rock below.
sentences.chinese: 当大坝建成，逐渐积累的水压压向下方的岩石。

sentences.english: In open-pit mines, the problem of underground mining under the slope is usually encountered.
sentences.chinese: 边坡下方井工开采是一个露天煤矿普遍存在的问题。

sentences.english: Please select all the photos you request for the high-resolution version, and then click the bottom button.
sentences.chinese: 请在选中所有所需高像素图片后，点击下方按钮。

sentences.english: If you may have any question, please leave them below.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙妮有任何问题，请在预告下方留言。

sentences.english: A large complete bottom note LOGO.
Label each picture the appropriate style of cooking potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 请把正确的土豆烹饪方法填到相应的图片下方。

sentences.english: The bottom part of each separation container unit is provided with water outlet passage pointed back and downward.
sentences.chinese: 各分离容器单元的底部均有指向后下方的出水通道。

sentences.english: The Nike shox has a slot beneath the cushion that lines the shoe.
sentences.chinese: 耐克弹力柱鞋在鞋垫下方有一个狭缝。

sentences.english: Fuk golden words below to apply the same process for "Fu as the East China Sea water" font.
sentences.chinese: 金色福字下方采用同样的工艺作“福如东海水”字体。

sentences.english: Set this option to show the file size below the image thumbnail.
sentences.chinese: 设定此选项以在图像缩略图下方显示文件大小。

sentences.english: The inferior and lateral convex border of the stomach is the greater curvature .
sentences.chinese: 胃的下方及侧面凸缘是胃大弯。

sentences.english: A light tube hangs below the shelves on four leather straps.
sentences.chinese: 灯管用四条皮革带挂在架子的下方。

sentences.english: It's an image that will be displayed below the drawings, like a frame for example.
sentences.chinese: 这是显示在桌面小程式下方的图形，就像是相框一样。

sentences.english: The slope mine under the town was slowly filled with salt brine making the surface subside.
sentences.chinese: 小镇下方的倾斜巷道慢慢被盐水充满以致地表下沉。

definition: to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
the top/above/overhead/upwards/the top margin/above-mentioned/those higher up
left/the left side/to the left of
to pay attention to/to follow sth closely/to follow (on social media)/concern/interest/attention
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
